targets.query: DeviceModel:$Device AND VersionName:$VersionName AND AndroidOSVersion:$AndroidOSVersion AND ScreenName:$ScreenName
DeviceModel:$Device AND VersionName:$VersionName AND AndroidOSVersion:$AndroidOSVersion AND ScreenName:$ScreenName

panels.content:
# Activity onCreate and onResume
These two Activity lifecycle methods are the most relevant in the Activity lifecycle. Remember to don't execute heavy tasks during these lifecycle methods or your users will be waiting for the screen UI too long.

targets.query: DeviceModel:$Device AND VersionName:$VersionName AND AndroidOSVersion:$AndroidOSVersion AND ScreenName:$ScreenName
DeviceModel:$Device AND VersionName:$VersionName AND AndroidOSVersion:$AndroidOSVersion AND ScreenName:$ScreenName

panels.content:
# Activity onPause and onDestroy
These two Activity lifecycle methods are related to the UI dismiss process. Remember to don't execute heavy tasks during these lifecycle methods or your users will be waiting for last Activity in the stack too long.

targets.query: DeviceModel:$Device AND VersionName:$VersionName AND AndroidOSVersion:$AndroidOSVersion AND ScreenName:$ScreenName

panels.content:
# Activity Visible Time

Measure how long your users are using your app by Activity name. Identify which Activities are being opened by your users and which not.

If your users spend just a bunch of seconds in your Activities, your app may not be performing well!
